alert.note: Alert for Mercer (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 07 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FOR THURSDAY JUNE 8... The Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection has issued a code ORANGE air quality alert for Thursday, including Mercer county. A code ORANGE air quality alert means that air pollution concentrations within the region may become unhealthy for sensitive groups. Sensitive groups include children, the elderly, and people suffering from asthma, heart disease, or other lung diseases. The effects of air pollution can be minimized by avoiding outdoor exercise or strenuous activity. For more information on ground-level ozone and fine particles, visit http://www.airnow.gov and https://www.ahs.dep.pa.gov/AQPartnersWeb/
